leaflet.personalStatement: Peter is married to Christine and they have three children. He has lived in Kent since 1993 and, after 25 years in the leisure industry, started a successful swimming pool business in 2009. He has many yearsâ€™ experience as a local councillor, a school governor and a charity director. - If elected to parliament he will use this experience to fight to improve the quality of life and job prospects for all of his constituents by implementing UKIP's policies.
